name: PremiaUncutErc20Wrapper
description: Wrapper for uPremia reward in PremiaOption contract. This wrapper is intended to solve a minor issue where uPremia reward would be minted in PremiaOption contract, instead of user's wallet, when using flash exercise.

functionDecorators.name: getTokenPrice
functionDecorators.description: Get the usd price of a token.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: The token from which to give usd price.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: The address for which to mint.

functionDecorators.name: mintReward
functionDecorators.description: Mint corresponding uPremia reward based on protocol fee paid.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: The address for which to mint.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: The token in which the protocol fee has been paid.
